mapper.insert: insert into sp_semic_dictionary (id, semic_type_id, full_name, abbreviation, description, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{id}, #{semicTypeId}, #{fullName}, #{abbreviation}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy})
mapper.update: update sp_semic_dictionary set id = #{id}, semic_type_id = #{semicTypeId}, full_name = #{fullName}, abbreviation = #{abbreviation}, description = #{description}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_by = #{createBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy} where id = #{id}
